name: BOYSEN®® Alkyd Reflectorized Traffic Paint

info.title: DESCRIPTION
info.body: BOYSEN®® Alkyd Reflectorized Traffic Paint is an alkyd-type paint specially developed to resist the rigorous environment encountered on roads, pavements, and parking lots. It forms a durable film that offers good wear resistance and better reflective bead retention for safety markings.

info.title: PRINCIPAL USES
info.body: It is a reflectorized variant to the alkyd-based traffic paint for use on road markings and pavement linings.

info.title: SERVICE CONDITIONS
info.body:
It is ideal only on areas in direct contact to wheel traffic; otherwise, the reflectorized effect will not manifest.
Mix the paint thoroughly to avoid settling of glass beads.

info.title: SURFACE PREPARATION
info.subtitle: Concrete Surfaces
info.body: Allow new concrete to dry for 14-28 days under normal weather conditions before painting. Remove oil and grease by using detergents or degreasers. Painting over a roughened concrete floor is recommended to improve adhesion of succeeding coats.

info.title: PAINTING SCHEDULE
info.body: 1st coat: BOYSEN®® Epoxy Primer White B‑2200 (diluted with 1:1 Epoxy Reducer B‑55) 2nd coat & 3rd coat: BOYSEN®® Alkyd Reflectorized Traffic Paint (in any desired color)
